data.DescriptionHtml:
All sleeping creatures in the area awaken.
Those who are unconscious because of subdual damage wake up and become staggered (see Subdual Damage in Chapter 8 of the Player's Handbook).
This spell does not affect dying creatures.
data.Name: Dawn
data.Rulebook: Masters of the Wild: A Guidebook to Barbarians, Druids, and Rangers
data.Target: All creatures within a 15-ft.-radius burst centered on you
